requirements.summary: Implement Pokecoin balance tracking UI with input form and balance history display
acceptanceCriteria: Users can input their current Pokecoin balance
Users can view their Pokecoin balance history
Balance updates are persisted in the backend

file_operations.description: Create a component that displays the current Pokecoin balance fetched from the backend using viewPokecoinBalance() and provides a form to log new balance entries using logPokecoinBalance(). Include the generated pokecoin icon at frontend/public/assets/generated/pokecoin-icon.dim_256x256.png as visual branding. Display balance history and handle loading/error states.
Wire the PokecoinTracker component into the main app layout, adding navigation or a tab/section for Pokecoin tracking so users can access the balance tracking feature.

requirements.summary: Create shiny female Pokemon tracker UI with add/search functionality and collection display
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add shiny female Pokemon to their collection with species name
Users can view a list of all tracked shiny female Pokemon
Each Pokemon entry includes species identification
Users can mark Pokemon as found or desired

file_operations.description: Create a component that allows users to log shiny female Pokemon using logPokemon() with name, isShiny=true, and isFemale=true. Include a search input that calls searchShinyFemalePokemon() to filter results. Display each Pokemon entry with species name and status (found/desired). Use the generated shiny sparkle icon at frontend/public/assets/generated/shiny-sparkle.dim_128x128.png to visually highlight shiny entries.
Wire the ShinyFemaleTracker component into the main app, adding a navigation link or tab so users can access the shiny female Pokemon tracking feature.

requirements.summary: Build Google Play payout tracking UI with payout form and history display
acceptanceCriteria: Users can record payout amounts in their local currency
Users can view payout history and totals
Payout records are linked to Pokecoin transactions
Users can see cumulative payout totals

file_operations.description: Create a component that displays payout history fetched from viewPayouts() and provides a form to log new payouts using logPayout() with amount, currency, and date inputs. Calculate and display cumulative payout totals. Include the generated payout badge icon at frontend/public/assets/generated/payout-badge.dim_128x128.png for visual branding. Handle loading and error states.
Wire the PayoutManager component into the main app layout, adding navigation or a tab/section for payout management so users can access the payout tracking feature.

requirements.summary: Apply Pokemon-themed visual design with vibrant colors, playful typography, and card-based layouts
acceptanceCriteria: UI uses a Pokemon-inspired color palette with vibrant accent colors
Layout uses card-based components for Pokemon and transaction displays
Overall design feels cohesive and game-like

file_operations.description: Update global styles to include a Pokemon-inspired color palette with vibrant yellows, reds, blues, and accent colors. Add custom font styling for playful yet readable typography. Define utility classes for card-based layouts and game-like visual effects.

Extend the Tailwind configuration with Pokemon-themed color tokens (e.g., pokecoin-gold, shiny-pink, payout-green) and custom spacing/border-radius utilities for card-based layouts. Configure typography settings for playful font rendering.

Apply Pokemon-themed styling to the main app layout using the new color palette and typography. Use card-based layout components from shadcn/ui (e.g., Card) to structure the interface cohesively. Ensure all sections feel visually unified with game-like aesthetics.
